Comment: The response provides a thorough explanation of the significance of Jesus' self-identification as the "Son of Man" and effectively connects it to Jesus' dual nature as fully human and fully divine, His role as the Messiah, and His connection to humanity. The response demonstrates a clear understanding of the biblical roots and theological implications of the title "Son of Man," aligning well with Christian beliefs and offering insights that strengthen one's faith. Great job!
